title: More U.S. States Say No to Russian Vodka Amid Ukraine Invasion
sub_head: Most bans apply to just two or three brands; vodkas with Russian names that are produced elsewhere aren’t included
body:
At least 11 states, including Oregon, North Carolina and West Virginia, have banned the sale of Russian-made alcohol to denounce Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.
“The Granite State will take whatever measures to support the people of Ukraine and oppose the unprovoked attack,” New Hampshire Republican Gov. Chris Sununu said in his order banning the booze.
